00022 class CPSParamHelper implements IPSBase
00023 {
00024     //********************************************************************************
00025     //* Private Members

00033     protected static $m_arParams = array();
00034     public function getParameter( $sKey ) { return PS::o( self::$m_arParams, $sKey ); }
00035     public function setParameter( $sKey, $sValue ) { self::$m_arParams[ $sKey ] = $sValue; }
00036     public function getParameters() { return self::$m_arParams; }
00037     public function resetParameters() { self::$m_arParams = array(); }
00038     
00077     public static function buildParameterSet( $arSource = array(), $arColumns = array() )
00078     {
00079         self::resetParameters();
00080         
00081         $_sCondition = null;
00082         
00083         foreach ( $arColumns as $_sKey => $_oColumn )
00084         {
00085             $_sTemplate = '{column}';
00086             $_sOperator = '=';
00087             $_sColumn = $_oColumn;
00088             $_bOr = false;
00089             
00090             if ( is_array( $_sColumn ) )
00091             {
00092                 //  Set the column name
00093                 $_sColumn = $_sKey;
00094                 
00095                 //  No data? Don't process...
00096                 if ( isset( $arSource[ $_sColumn ] ) )
00097                 {
00098                     if ( $_bLike = PS::o( $_oColumn, 'like', false ) )
00099                     {
00100                         //  Special 'like' case...
00101                         $_sTemplate = '%{column}%';
00102                         $_sOperator = 'like';
00103                     }
00104                     else if ( $_bLike = PS::o( $_oColumn, '^like', false ) )
00105                     {
00106                         //  Special 'like' case...
00107                         $_sTemplate = '{column}%';
00108                         $_sOperator = 'like';
00109                     }
00110                     else if ( $_bLike = PS::o( $_oColumn, 'like$', false ) )
00111                     {
00112                         //  Special 'like' case...
00113                         $_sTemplate = '%{column}';
00114                         $_sOperator = 'like';
00115                     }
00116                     else
00117                     {
00118                         //  Special operators...
00119                         if ( PS::o( $_oColumn, 'lt' ) ) $_sOperator = '<';
00120                         if ( PS::o( $_oColumn, 'lte' ) ) $_sOperator = '<=';
00121                         if ( PS::o( $_oColumn, 'eq' ) ) $_sOperator = '=';
00122                         if ( PS::o( $_oColumn, 'gt' ) ) $_sOperator = '>';
00123                         if ( PS::o( $_oColumn, 'gte' ) ) $_sOperator = '>=';
00124                         if ( PS::o( $_oColumn, 'or' ) ) $_bOr = true;
00125                         
00126                         //  All others...
00127                         $_sTemplate = PS::o( $_oColumn, 'template', '{column}' );
00128                         
00129                         //  Will override special ones above if both are supplied.
00130                         $_sOperator = PS::o( $_oColumn, 'operator', '=' );
00131                     }
00132                     
00133                     //  Date only...
00134                     if ( PS::o( $_oColumn, 'dateOnly', false ) ) $_sTemplate = "date({$_sTemplate})";
00135                 }
00136                 else
00137                     $_sColumn = null;
00138             }
00139             
00140             //  Make the parameter if we have a value...
00141             if ( null != $_sColumn ) $_sCondition = self::findParam( $arSource, $_sColumn, $_sCondition, $_sOperator, $_sTemplate, $_bOr );
00142         }
00143 
00144         //  Return the new conditions...
00145         return $_sCondition;
00146     }
00147     
00162     public static function findParam( $arSource = array(), $sColumn, $sCondition = null, $sOperator = '=', $sTemplate = '{column}', $bOr = false )
00163     {
00164         if ( isset( $arSource[ $sColumn ] ) )
00165         {
00166             //  Only process if value isn't blank. 
00167             $_sTemp = trim( PS::o( $arSource, $sColumn ) );
00168             if ( strlen( $_sTemp ) ) $sCondition = self::makeParam( $sColumn, $_sTemp, $sCondition, $sOperator, $sTemplate, $bOr );
00169         }
00170         
00171         //  Return the condition string...
00172         return $sCondition;
00173     }
00174     
00188     public static function makeParam( $sColumn, $oValue, $sCondition = null, $sOperator = '=', $sTemplate = '{column}', $bOr = false )
00189     {
00190         $_sParam = ':' . $sColumn;
00191         $sCondition .= ( $sCondition ? ( $bOr ? ' or ' : ' and ' ) : '' ) . "`{$sColumn}` {$sOperator} {$_sParam}";
00192         self::setParameter( $_sParam, str_ireplace( '{column}', $oValue, $sTemplate ) );
00193         
00194         //  Return the condition string...
00195         return $sCondition;
00196     }
